LABEL: 0x3BA
STRING: After class, I waited in the classroom for Scykoe-sensei to arrive.

LABEL: 0x41D
STRING: I was thinking so much about yesterday that class seemed to fly by.

LABEL: 0x48E
STRING: Soon, I'm going to have dinner at Sensei's house.

LABEL: 0x4D9
STRING: I'm so excited to be able to enjoy Sensei's homemade food again.

LABEL: 0x542
STRING: It's nice to have something to look forward to at the end of the day.

LABEL: 0x59D
STRING: By the way, yesterday's dishes were really creative and delicious.

LABEL: 0x600
STRING: Sigh. Sensei, I can't wait for you to come soon enough...

LABEL: 0x64D
STRING: Reading my light novel is a good way to kill time.

LABEL: 0x696
STRING: No matter how long the wait, I've got enough reading material to wait it out.

LABEL: 0x6F9
STRING: "This reality is a fiction, so if I destroy it and become God..."

LABEL: 0x759
STRING: "It won't take me long to change the whole world."

LABEL: 0x7AB
STRING: Ah...

LABEL: 0x7DE
STRING: I-Ichigoaulait-tan... You're such a scary girl.

LABEL: 0x838
STRING: Even if you have to kill someone to get to the person you love,

LABEL: 0x871
STRING: is this the so called "true love?" ...Nagisa-tan is really cute though.

LABEL: 0x987
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x995
STRING: "Yo, Metarou! What's up?"

LABEL: 0xB3D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB4B
STRING: "Oh, he's reading something weird again. How creepy..."

LABEL: 0xC3D
STRING: While I was reading my light novel, Yukimaru and Nana approached me.

LABEL: 0xC9B
STRING: Shit.

LABEL: 0xCB8
STRING: I was so engrossed in reading that I didn't even notice them coming up to me.

LABEL: 0xDC1
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xDCF
STRING: "Hey, Metarou, you're not busy today, right? Are you coming to the arcade with us?"

LABEL: 0xEC5
STRING: Yukimaru invites me to play in his usual manner.

LABEL: 0xF20
STRING: But unfortunately, I've already made arrangements to go to Sensei's house...

LABEL: 0x102B
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1039
STRING: "Hey, you're going too, right? We haven't played together in a while, you should hang out with us a bit!"

LIST.STRING: Who'd go out with people like you?

LABEL: 0x1224
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: "Why, you can't go? What's the matter?"

LABEL: 0x13B9
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x13C7
STRING: "...Isn't that fine? If anything, it's convenient I think."

LABEL: 0x155F
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x156D
STRING: "Haaa??? What's the matter with you, suddenly running your mouth like that."

LABEL: 0x1702
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1710
STRING: "Metarou's truly shit. Garbage. Worthless."

LABEL: 0x1897
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x18A5
STRING: "Oi oi oi, you're going too far, Nana-chan!"

LABEL: 0x1995
STRING: Nana was in a bad mood, but this is also perfectly normal for her.

LABEL: 0x19FC
STRING: I know Nana is fond of Yukimaru, so my presence would only be a hindrance.

LABEL: 0x1A70
STRING: Sheesh, no need to be so roundabout about it.

LABEL: 0x1A9D
STRING: Just hook up already...

LABEL: 0x1B94
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1BA2
STRING: "I'm happy enough to be alone with Yukimaru, it doesn't matter if that guy's here or not."

LABEL: 0x1D49
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1D57
STRING: "Oh! How nice of you, Nana-chan! Then, let's go play together!"

LABEL: 0x1F02
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1F10
STRING: "...Hmph. I don't want him around. He can rot in hell for all I care."

LABEL: 0x20A1
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x20AF
STRING: "Yukimaru?"

LABEL: 0x2216
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2224
STRING: "Sorry, why don't you go on ahead without me?"

LABEL: 0x239B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2492
STRING: Nana nodded curtly and walked out of the classroom.

LABEL: 0x25A7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x25B5
STRING: "Hahaha, Metarou, you..."

LABEL: 0x2695
STRING: Yukimaru chuckles and whispers in my ear.

LABEL: 0x278E
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x279C
STRING: "...You found yourself a girlfriend, didn't you?"

LABEL: 0x2947
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2955
STRING: "Who do you think I am? You can't hide it from me, I'm the biggest womanizer in the school!"

LABEL: 0x2A58
STRING: No, I don't care if you say it so proudly.

LABEL: 0x2A8F
STRING: It's a disgraceful title, no matter how you look at it.

LABEL: 0x2ADC
STRING: The relationship between Sensei and I... We're not exactly a couple, but indeed... Yukimaru, you're more or less on the money.

LABEL: 0x2BF7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2C05
STRING: "So, spit it out, who's the lucky girl? I promise I won't tell Nana, so tell me!"

LABEL: 0x2D18
STRING: I wasn't sure if I should tell the truth, but I've known this guy a long time.

LABEL: 0x2D87
STRING: No way I'm going to tell Nana, but it would be strange to hide it from Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x2DFA
STRING: So I decided to tell him the whole story.

LABEL: 0x30A9
STRING: I came to visit Sensei's house again, and I was treated to another delicious meal.

LABEL: 0x3118
STRING: I've told Yukimaru everything, so I don't feel particularly guilty about my relationship with Sensei right now.

LABEL: 0x319B
STRING: From an outsider's viewpoint, they might see it as a "forbidden love between a student and a teacher," but it's different, we've always known each other.

LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: There's no way I can see Scykoe-oneechan as a stranger now.

LABEL: 0x32AC
STRING: Love...

LABEL: 0x32C9
STRING: Yeah, this is probably love, I guess.

LABEL: 0x3317
STRING: I know I've been looking at her in a sexual way,

LABEL: 0x3366
STRING: but that's normal for a healthy high school boy, right?

LABEL: 0x33DE
STRING: By the way, Sensei's house is so cozy.

LABEL: 0x3435
STRING: Even in this humid summer, once I'm inside the air conditioned room it's so refreshing.

LABEL: 0x3545
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3553
STRING: "Hey Mecchan, thanks for waiting. What're you doing?"

LABEL: 0x3632
STRING: I showed Sensei the cover of my light novel.

LABEL: 0x3727
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3735
STRING: "Fufu, that again. You really like it, don't you?"

LABEL: 0x38B6
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x38C4
STRING: "It's kind of comforting to have Mecchan reading a book next to me... You can stay here forever... you know?"

LABEL: 0x3A81
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3A8F
STRING: "It's not that I want you to do anything in particular, it's just that it makes me feel safe to be around you. So thank you, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x3BB8
STRING: Sensei smiled serenely at me.

LABEL: 0x3C0B
STRING: ...It's not just me. It seemed she also enjoyed her time with me.

LABEL: 0x3C88
STRING: I feel much more at ease here than at home, a special place for the two of us where time flows slowly.

LABEL: 0x3CF7
STRING: Speaking of which, I've been thinking about it ever since I came to Sensei's house, but something smells sweet...?

LABEL: 0x3DD9
STRING: I looked at the corner of the room and noticed a small planter with a blue flower in it.

LABEL: 0x3E5A
STRING: Oh, so this was the source of the scent, I didn't notice it at all when I was here before.

LABEL: 0x3EDF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3EED
STRING: "Are you interested? It's a flower called rosemary."

LABEL: 0x3F5E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3F6C
STRING: "It smells good, doesn't it? A friend gave it to me before I moved here."

LABEL: 0x3FF1
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x3FFF
STRING: "You can harvest the leaves and dry them as herbs to add to your cooking... You can also dry the flowers to make potpourri."

LABEL: 0x40B4
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x40C2
STRING: "In Europe, they call it the 'rejuvenating herb' because it makes the skin beautiful."

LABEL: 0x415B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4169
STRING: "Nice, isn't it? I really wish I could be young again, I'm about to turn a corner in my life... I better watch out for my skin."

LABEL: 0x41F2
STRING: Apparently, it's a flower called rosemary. I'd better remember that name.

LABEL: 0x434E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x435C
STRING: "Oh, it's already so late."

LABEL: 0x4435
STRING: Sensei looked at the clock and said in a lonely voice.

LABEL: 0x4488
STRING: It was already past 22:00.

LABEL: 0x44D7
STRING: Generally speaking, I would be in trouble if I still hadn't come home by this hour...

LABEL: 0x4534
STRING: If I could, I'd stay here forever, because I enjoy spending time with Sensei and it makes me feel at ease.

LABEL: 0x4657
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4665
STRING: "Ah... How about this!"

LABEL: 0x47D2
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x47E0
STRING: "Hey, why don't you stay the night? You have a day off school tomorrow. So why not leisurely spend some time together?"

LABEL: 0x48F5
STRING: Oh...

LABEL: 0x492A
STRING: Oh, oh, the sleepover event flag has been raised?

LABEL: 0x4979
STRING: Er, eer, um.

LABEL: 0x49B2
STRING: Hold on a second. I can't keep my head on straight. ...I'm in complete disarray.

LABEL: 0x4AC7
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4AD5
STRING: "Hey? How about it? Just for today? I still want to talk with you, Mecchan, a lot more..."

LIST.STRING: Sensei, if you say so, it can't be helped!

LABEL: 0x4CE0
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4CEE
STRING: "Yay! Thanks, Mecchan♪"

LABEL: 0x4E6B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4E79
STRING: "Well then, let's enjoy ourselves a lot tonight."

LABEL: 0x4F5C
STRING: Enjoy...

LABEL: 0x4F93
STRING: Enjoy...? Enjoy, ourselves...

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: Enjoy ourselves, what exactly do you mean by that?!

LABEL: 0x5033
STRING: My heart is thumping faster and faster in my chest.

LABEL: 0x5082
STRING: As if to tease me, Sensei held out her arms as if waiting for me.

LABEL: 0x51B5
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x51C3
STRING: "Come on, Mecchan, just jump in here and I'll give you a big hug."

LABEL: 0x52F3
STRING: I couldn't resist, so I plunged into her ample bosom.

LABEL: 0x535E
STRING: Sensei's arms clung to me tightly, and I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x53D3
STRING: Ugh... Amazing. She smells so good after a bath...

LABEL: 0x5430
STRING: Unable to go against the flow, I nuzzled my face into that spacious cleavage.

LABEL: 0x549F
STRING: Haa haa... What a place to relax in.

LABEL: 0x54F4
STRING: Her boobs are soft, warm, and they smell good...

LABEL: 0x5555
STRING: I couldn't get enough of that nice smell so I took in deep breaths. Inhale, exhale.

LABEL: 0x566C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x567A
STRING: "Heehee, stop it, it tickles. Your breath is hot, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x5819
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5827
STRING: "You're still hungry for more? Got it, Onee-chan'll give you head pats, ok?"

LABEL: 0x59D0
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x59DE
STRING: "There, there. Mecchan's a good boy〜"

LABEL: 0x5AC1
STRING: Sensei patted my hair like she was scratching a dog's head.

LABEL: 0x5BD2
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5BE0
STRING: "I remember we used to do this often."

LABEL: 0x5CBB
STRING: I'm enveloped by warmth and a comforting voice.

LABEL: 0x5D1C
STRING: ...If I let my guard down, I'm going to fall asleep at this rate.

LABEL: 0x5E15
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5E23
STRING: "You know, I went through a lot... of difficult times before I came back here."

LABEL: 0x5FBE
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5FCC
STRING: "I was sad and cried every day until I met you, Mecchan..."

LABEL: 0x615F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x616D
STRING: "But then, when I saw your face... All that pain disappeared."

LABEL: 0x6314
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6322
STRING: "I'm sorry, this... doesn't matter."

LABEL: 0x6405
STRING: Scykoe-oneechan suddenly seemed so weak and vulnerable.

LABEL: 0x646A
STRING: I gently stroked Scykoe-oneechan's head, just as she had done earlier.

LABEL: 0x657F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x658D
STRING: "Heehee... are you worried about me?"

LABEL: 0x670C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x671A
STRING: "Thanks, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x6820
STRING: Some time passed as we stared at each other in silence.

LABEL: 0x6913
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6921
STRING: "Mecchan, let's kiss."

LABEL: 0x6A98
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6AA6
STRING: "You know, I wanted to do this with Mecchan after coming back here."

LABEL: 0x6B9F
STRING: Sensei's face got closer and closer.

LABEL: 0x6C8A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6C98
STRING: "Will you comfort me...?"

LABEL: 0x6D60
STRING: Sensei's lips came, I...

LABEL: 0x6DDC
STRING: I refused.

LABEL: 0x6E11
STRING: No, get a grip on yourself, Metarou!

LABEL: 0x6E50
STRING: No matter how much we've known each other since we were kids and have feelings for each other...

LABEL: 0x6EC7
STRING: An illicit relationship between a teacher and a student won't be forgiven!

LABEL: 0x6F26
STRING: So, I rejected Sensei's lips.

LABEL: 0x7015
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x7023
STRING: "...Mecchan. So, we can't?"

LABEL: 0x719C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x71AA
STRING: "Why not? Is it because you don't like me?"

LABEL: 0x728D
STRING: Sensei slumped her shoulders in disappointment.

LABEL: 0x7378
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x7386
STRING: "That has to be it. It's cause you don't like me, right?"

LABEL: 0x757D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x758B
STRING: "It's okay, you don't have to be so uptight, I'd feel better if you made it clear that you didn't want to do it."

LABEL: 0x769E
STRING: Sen...sei?

LABEL: 0x7799
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x77A7
STRING: "As I thought, I'm not suitable... I'm not good enough."

LABEL: 0x7896
STRING: Sensei had a serious expression, and was muttering something in a soft voice.

LABEL: 0x7993
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x79A1
STRING: "I knew one day I would regret this. ...I was right. I should never have had any hope from the start."

LABEL: 0x7AB8
STRING: I've been thinking about this for a while now, but something smells weird...

LABEL: 0x7B1B
STRING: It kinda smells like gas...

LABEL: 0x7B6E
STRING: My god, Sensei... you opened the gas valve?

LABEL: 0x7CA5
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x7CB3
STRING: "It's such a lonely thing to die alone... My dear sweet Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x7E4C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x7E5A
STRING: "Won't you die with me?"

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Arrogance」

LABEL: 0x8168
STRING: I accepted the kiss.

LABEL: 0x8241
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x824F
STRING: "Mec...chan..."

LABEL: 0x831E
STRING: Closing my eyes, my very soul is filled with a sweet aroma.

LABEL: 0x8419
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8427
STRING: "I love you..."

LABEL: 0x84E9
STRING: Scykoe...sensei...

LABEL: 0x850C
STRING: No, Scykoe onee-chan...

LABEL: 0x854A
STRING: I don't care which one it is anymore.

LABEL: 0x8573
STRING: Whether she's my teacher or not.

LABEL: 0x85C4
STRING: Or whether she was my beloved older sister.

LABEL: 0x8617
STRING: Right now I can only see her as just a woman.

LABEL: 0x8672
STRING: I lost my virginity that night.

LABEL: 0x890F
STRING: The memories of my childhood are somewhat vague.

LABEL: 0x8964
STRING: It's all a blur... Something that fades with the passage of time.

LABEL: 0x89D7
STRING: What kind of kid was I?

LABEL: 0x8A22
STRING: I think I was quite naughty and I always used to make my mother angry.

LABEL: 0x8A85
STRING: That's about all I can remember.

LABEL: 0x8AD4
STRING: ...But there's something I can remember quite clearly.

LABEL: 0x8B31
STRING: I remember that in elementary school, I was good friends with an older girl, and that I used to play with her a lot.

LABEL: 0x8BA8
STRING: No family relationship, just a girl from the same neighbourhood.

LABEL: 0x8C01
STRING: Even so, she was a very important person.

LABEL: 0x8C4A
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x8CCB
STRING: She had to leave the city one day.

LABEL: 0x8D2E
STRING: I don't know if that's because of changing schools or something else.

LABEL: 0x8D91
STRING: The only thing she told me was that she wanted to be a teacher.

LABEL: 0x8E02
STRING: Her name was Scykoe.

LABEL: 0x8E51
STRING: The last night we spent together, was the day of the festival.

LABEL: 0x8EAE
STRING: The midsummer sky was in full bloom.

LABEL: 0x8EF5
STRING: With a loud bang, fireworks like petals scattered in the night sky.

LABEL: 0x8FB0
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x8FC4
STRING: "Hey, do you remember, Mecchan?"

LABEL: 0x9027
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x903B
STRING: "I was on my way home from school when I found an abandoned puppy."

LABEL: 0x90B4
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x90C8
STRING: You said you were going to keep him, so you brought him home, and your mom got mad at you for it."

LABEL: 0x915C
STRING: ...Oh, something like that did happen.

LABEL: 0x91AD
STRING: I've always had a weakness for cute, weak little things.

LABEL: 0x9208
STRING: If a puppy stares at me with eyes like that, I just couldn't leave it alone, can I?

LABEL: 0x92D3
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x92E7
STRING: "What happened to that puppy... in the end?"

LABEL: 0x9345
STRING: ...I don't know.

LABEL: 0x93E2
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x93F6
STRING: "I went over to check it out, but the next day, all I saw was a box, and it was gone."

LABEL: 0x948B
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x949F
STRING: "...I wonder, did someone pick it up?"

LABEL: 0x954C
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x9560
STRING: "If it got picked up, I hope its new owner is someone nice."

LABEL: 0x95D4
STRING: ...Indeed.

LABEL: 0x960F
STRING: Both ourselves and the puppy, we don't get to choose our parents or our owners.

LABEL: 0x96CC
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x96E0
STRING: "Hey, I wonder why the puppy's original owner did this. It's the same as killing it."

LABEL: 0x977F
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x9793
STRING: "I wonder if they'd throw away human children too... They're living beings all the same."

LABEL: 0x985E
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x9872
STRING: "I guess it's because they think taking care of it has become too troublesome."

LABEL: 0x98CE
STRING: ...I wonder.

LABEL: 0x990F
STRING: I don't want to think that people could be so quick to abandon a life.

LABEL: 0x9994
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x99A8
STRING: "Maybe they just wanted to forget it all... go somewhere, anywhere else."
